googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.vbmAbsenteeBallotRules:
* All registered Oregon voters automatically receive vote-by-mail ballots. 
* You can still request a one-time absentee ballot if you need your ballot mailed someplace other than your usual address.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsOvr: You can register to vote online if you have an Oregon driver's license or state ID card.  If not, you can register to vote by mail or in person.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.idRequirementsSdr: Bring your Oregon driver's license or state ID card with you. If you don't have one, bring ONE photo ID that shows your name, and ONE document that shows your name and current address.  Acceptable documents include a utility bill, bank statement, paycheck, residential lease, or any government document that shows your name and address.
googleSheetEarlyVotingDataRow.registrationRules:
To register in Oregon you must:

  * be a citizen of the United States
  * be a resident of Oregon
  * at least 16 years old (to vote, you must be 18 by Election Day)
